name: Participation in federal program Note Chapter heading amended by L 1985, c 252, 1; L 1999, c 72, 2.
text:
Participation in federal program.]  The department of labor and industrial relations and the University of Hawaii are authorized to participate in the Manpower Development and Training Act of 1962, as amended, by providing from funds appropriated by the legislature for such purpose, in accordance with and to the extent required by the federal act, amounts necessary to match the amounts expended by the United States Treasury. [L 1964, c 11, §2; am L 1965, c 23, §1; am L 1968, c 71, §5; HRS §202-21]
 
Cross References
 
  Establishment of manpower development and training programs, see chapter 394.
